subject: Investing
title: Altcoins: Evaluating the Long Tail
description: A quick, practical guide to Altcoins: Evaluating the Long Tail.

hook.text: Over 20,000 cryptocurrencies exist. Most will go to zero. A few will generate enormous returns.

buildup.text: Altcoins are every cryptocurrency besides Bitcoin. They range from serious protocols to outright scams.

discovery.text: Evaluating an altcoin means checking its use case, team, tokenomics, community, and on-chain activity.

twist.text: High market-cap rank doesn't mean quality. Several top-20 coins from 2017 are now worthless.

climax.text: Position sizing matters most with altcoins: limit exposure to what you can afford to lose entirely.

punchline.text: The altcoin market rewards research and punishes hype chasers.

quiz.question: What is the most important rule when investing in altcoins?
options: Limit exposure to what you can afford to lose
